JobFullDesc: About the Role  Uber is looking for a Senior Software Engineer to join the Cadence team. If you want to feel and see that your contributions matter, if you love working in a dynamic, agile, continually improving environment, or if you are up to a challenge of building services that will take Uber forward, come talk to us. [Cadence](https://cadenceworkflow.io/) is an open-source orchestration engine for executing long-running business logic. It is a critical component in many of Uber’s products. We're part of the Core Infrastructure group, which means we build systems that solve hard problems for all of Uber. Watch [our talk](https://youtu.be/llmsBGKOuWI) at the Uber Open Summit to learn more.Focus on customers and deliver features that excite them and improve their productivityIdentify emerging patterns and get ahead of the need for new service, resources, and automationBreak down requirements into architecture and deliver code, while keeping operational issues in mindWrite clear documentation so that other engineers can jump in and get things done---- Basic Qualifications ----5+ years experience preferred in an Enterprise Development EnvironmentBachelors Degree or higher in Computer Science or related fields
